column1: Little Goat Diner////This is the first restaurant I went to when I moved to Chicago
column2: and I'm so glad I did because it set the stage. Make sure you get a reservation in advanced
column3: though once I did walk in early in the morning and got lucky. Everything on the menu is delicious
column4: but specifically the pork belly homefries
column5: I won't go there without getting those. Drinks are good
column7: and the space is really fun and well decorated. It all works together for an amazing experience.
